Account/index.js, line 23

get( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Gets info on a specific course
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to get info on
includeSyllabus boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, includes syllabus body
includeTerm boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, includes term
includeAccount boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, includes account Id
includeDescription boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, includes public description
includeSections boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, includes sections
includeTeachers boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, includes teachers
includeCourseImage boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, includes the course image
includeNeedsGradingCount boolean <optional>
 false If truthy, includes the number of students who still need to be graded
Returns
Canvas course https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/courses.html#Course
Details

Gabriel Abrams

Course/index.js, line 47

listEnrollments( options ) → {Promise.<Array.<Object>>}

Description
Gets the list of enrollments in a course
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to query
types string <optional>
 all list of enrollment types to include: ['student', 'ta', 'teacher', 'designer', 'observer'] Defaults to all types.
activeOnly string <optional>
 false If truthy, only active enrollments included
includeAvatar string <optional>
 false If truthy, avatar_url is included
includeGroups string <optional>
 false If truthy, group_ids is included
Returns
list of Canvas Enrollments https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/enrollments.html#Enrollment
Details

Gabriel Abrams

Course/index.js, line 228

getUser( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Gets info on a specific user in a course
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to query
userId number Canvas user Id to get
includeEmail boolean <optional>
 If true, user email is included
includeEnrollments boolean <optional>
 If true, user's enrollments in this course are included
includeLocked boolean <optional>
 If true, includes whether this enrollment is locked
includeAvatar boolean <optional>
 If true, user avatar url is included
includeBio boolean <optional>
 If true, user bio is included
Returns
Canvas user https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/users.html#User
Details

Gabriel Abrams
